import*as d3 from"d3";import Update from'./Update.js';import{drawTimechart,updateTimechart}from'./Timechart';import{updateRegionchart}from'./Regionchart';var selectedToggle='#595454';var unselectedToggle='#EAEAEA';var unselectedToggleText='#000';var selectedToggleText='#FFF';function Layout(svg,options,data,filter,updateTable){// region chart toggle
